rules.fullName: AML Regime Examination Generic Welcome Letter
rules.formula: AND($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , Assignee__c <>"", or( ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Authorized"), ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Completed") ), Welcome_Email_Sent__c =false, ExamResult__c = "", CONTAINS(CC_Product__r.WFCategory__c, "CERT_Generic-AML-Regime"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Active") )

rules.fullName: APAC Singapore Regime Examination Welcome Letter
rules.formula: AND($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Active"), Assignee__c <>"", ExamResult__c = "", or( ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Authorized"), ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Completed") ), Welcome_Email_Sent__c =false, CONTAINS( Enterprise_Product_HL__c , "SG-AML-Regime"), not(CONTAINS( Enterprise_Product_HL__c , "Retake")), not(CONTAINS( Enterprise_Product_HL__c , "Extension")), CreatedDate > DATETIMEVALUE("2020-11-14 12:00:00") )

rules.fullName: APAC CAMS Virtual Classroom %28Standalone and Cert Package%29 Unpaid Orders
rules.formula: AND($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration', ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Inactive"), Assignee__c <>"", OR(CONTAINS(CC_Product__r.ccrz__SKU__c, "CAMSVSA"), CONTAINS(CC_Product__r.ccrz__SKU__c, "CAMSVS6A")), not(or( ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Authorized"), ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Completed"))), CC_Order__r.Total_Revenue__c >0, NOT(CONTAINS(CC_Product__r.ccrz__SKU__c, "CAMSVS6A_PREP")) )

rules.fullName: APAC CAMS6 Virtual Classroom %28Standalone and Cert Package%29 Registration Confirmation
rules.formula: AND ($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration',Assignee__c <> "",Paid_Cert__c=true,contains(CC_Product__r.WFCategory__c , "CAMS6_APAC_VC_1"),ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Active"))

and ( CONTAINS(CC_Product__r.WFCategory__c, "XWF00024ZWF"), not(ISBLANK(Assignee_User_Name__c)), CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"Data Migration"), ISBLANK( Mass_Update__c ), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Active"), Paid_Cert__c )

and($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration', ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Active"), ISCHANGED(Enterprise_Renewal_Email__c), Enterprise_Welcome_Email_Source__c = "APAC", Enterprise_Renewal_Email__c = TRUE, Contains(Assignee__r.Sys_Acct_Language_Preference__c , "en_US"), or( ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Authorized"), ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Completed") ))

and($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration', ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Active"), ISCHANGED(Enterprise_Renewal_Email__c), Enterprise_Welcome_Email_Source__c = "APAC", Enterprise_Renewal_Email__c = TRUE, Contains(Assignee__r.Sys_Acct_Language_Preference__c , "ja"), or( ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Authorized"), ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Completed") ))

rules.fullName: APAC Enterprise Renewal Email - Simplified Chinese
rules.formula: and($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration', ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Active"), ISCHANGED(Enterprise_Renewal_Email__c), Enterprise_Welcome_Email_Source__c = "APAC", Enterprise_Renewal_Email__c = TRUE, Contains(Assignee__r.Sys_Acct_Language_Preference__c , "zh_CN"), or( ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Authorized"), ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Completed") ))

rules.fullName: APAC Enterprise Renewal Email - Traditional Chinese
rules.formula: and($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration', ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Active"), ISCHANGED(Enterprise_Renewal_Email__c), Enterprise_Welcome_Email_Source__c = "APAC", Enterprise_Renewal_Email__c = TRUE, Contains(Assignee__r.Sys_Acct_Language_Preference__c , "zh_TW"), or( ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Authorized"), ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Completed") ))

and($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration', ISCHANGED(Enterprise_Welcome_Email__c), Enterprise_Welcome_Email_Source__c = "APAC", Contains(Assignee__r.Sys_Acct_Language_Preference__c , "en_US") , ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Active"), Enterprise_Welcome_Email__c = TRUE, or( ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Authorized"), ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Completed") ))

rules.fullName: APAC Enterprise Welcome Email - Bahasa Indonesia
rules.formula: and($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration', ISCHANGED(Enterprise_Welcome_Email__c), Enterprise_Welcome_Email_Source__c = "Asia", Enterprise_Welcome_Email__c = TRUE, ISPICKVAL( Account.Language_Preference__c , "Bahasa Indonesia"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Active"), Paid_Cert1__c )

and($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration', ISCHANGED(Enterprise_Welcome_Email__c), Enterprise_Welcome_Email_Source__c = "APAC", Enterprise_Welcome_Email__c = TRUE, Contains(Assignee__r.Sys_Acct_Language_Preference__c , "ja"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Active"), or( ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Authorized"), ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Completed") ) )

rules.fullName: APAC Enterprise Welcome Email - Simplified Chinese
rules.formula: and($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration', ISCHANGED(Enterprise_Welcome_Email__c), Enterprise_Welcome_Email_Source__c = "APAC", Enterprise_Welcome_Email__c = TRUE, Contains(Assignee__r.Sys_Acct_Language_Preference__c , "zh_CN"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Active"), or( ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Authorized"), ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Completed") ) )

rules.fullName: APAC Enterprise Welcome Email - Traditional Chinese
rules.formula: and($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration', ISCHANGED(Enterprise_Welcome_Email__c), Enterprise_Welcome_Email_Source__c = "APAC", Enterprise_Welcome_Email__c = TRUE, Contains(Assignee__r.Sys_Acct_Language_Preference__c , "zh_TW"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Active"), or( ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Authorized"), ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Completed") ) )

AND ($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , Assignee__c <> "" , or(ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Language__c, "English (Asia)"), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Language__c, "Chinese - Traditional"), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Language__c, "Chines - Simplified"), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Language__c, "Japanese"), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Language__c, "Korean"), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Language__c, "Bahasa Indonesia") ), Customizable_Email_Push__c )

rules.description: This was deactivated due to FSA-347 on 11/24/2020
rules.formula: NOT( ISNEW() ) && ISCHANGED( CancelDate__c) && ( NOT( ISNULL(CancelDate__c) ) ) && (CancelDate__c == TODAY() && $Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' )

AND($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Active"), Paid_Cert__c = TRUE,ExamResult__c = "", CONTAINS(CC_Product__r.WFCategory__c, "CERT_BI"), Assignee__c <>"")

rules.booleanFilter: (1 OR 2 OR 5) AND 3 AND 4 AND 6 AND (7 OR 8 OR 9)
(1 OR 2 OR 5) AND 3 AND 4 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9

rules.description: Welcome email for new chapter membership when asset is created for chapter membership products.
rules.formula: AND($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , Assignee__c <>"", ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_1__c, "Chapter"), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_2__c, "Membership"), NOT(contains(CC_Product__r.ccrz__SKU__c,"CMMON")), or( ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Authorized"), ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Completed") ), Welcome_Email_Sent__c =false, CreatedDate > DATETIMEVALUE("2020-11-14 12:00:00") , ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Active") )

rules.description: Welcome email for new montreal chapter membership when asset is created for chapter membership products.
rules.formula: AND($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , Assignee__c <>"", ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_1__c, "Chapter"), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_2__c, "Membership"), contains(CC_Product__r.ccrz__SKU__c,"CMMON"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Active"), or( ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Authorized"), ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Completed") ), Welcome_Email_Sent__c =false, CreatedDate > DATETIMEVALUE("2020-11-14 12:00:00") )

AND ($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' ,ISCHANGED(Enterprise_Renewal_Email__c),Enterprise_Renewal_Email__c = TRUE,Account.Name <> "Citigroup Enterprise",Account.Name <> "JPMorgan Chase Enterprise", Account.Name <> "Mizuho Bank Enterprise", Account.Name <> "BTMU ELA Enterprise", Account.Name <> "ACAMS Asia Enterprise", Account.Name <> "Ant Financial Enterprise", Account.Name <> "Thomson Reuters APAC Enterprise", Account.Name <> "BTMU Enterprise-LS", Account.Name <> "BTMU Enterprise", Account.Name <> "MICB Enterprise", Account.Name <> "Hua Nan Enterprise", Account.Name <> "CTBC Enterprise", Account.Name <> "Taiwan Cooperative Bank Enterprise",Account.Name <> "SCSB Enterprise",Account.Name <> "Taishin Enterprise",Account.Name <> "SMBC-Enterprise-HS",Account.Name <> "CCB Enterprise",Account.Name <> "Huawei Enterprise", Enterprise_Welcome_Email_Source__c <> "APAC",Enterprise_Welcome_Email_Source__c <> "Asia")

and($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , ISCHANGED(Enterprise_Welcome_Email__c), Enterprise_Welcome_Email__c = TRUE, Account.Name <> "Citigroup Enterprise", Account.Name <> "Mizuho Bank Enterprise", Account.Name <> "BTMU Enterprise", Account.Name <> "BTMU Enterprise-LS", Account.Name <> "ACAMS APAC Enterprise", Account.Name <> "Thomson Reuters APAC Enterprise", Account.Name <> "Ant Financial Enterprise", Account.Name <> "BTMU Enterprise-LS", Account.Name <> "BTMU Enterprise", Account.Name <> "CTBC Enterprise", Account.Name <> "Taiwan Cooperative Bank Enterprise", Account.Name <> "SCSB Enterprise", Account.Name <> "Taishin Enterprise", Account.Name <> "SMBC-Enterprise-HS", Account.Name <> "CCB Enterprise", Account.Name <> "Huawei Enterprise", Enterprise_Welcome_Email_Source__c <> "APAC")
AND ($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , ISCHANGED(Enterprise_Welcome_Email__c), Enterprise_Welcome_Email__c = TRUE, Account.Name = "Citigroup Enterprise")
AND ($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , ISCHANGED(Enterprise_Renewal_Email__c), Enterprise_Renewal_Email__c = TRUE, Account.Name = "Deutsche Bank Enterprise (AFC Group)")

rules.fullName: French CAMS6 Virtual Classroom %28Standalone and Cert Package%29 Registration Confirmation
rules.formula:
AND ($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Active"), Assignee__c <> "" , or( ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Authorized"), ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Completed") ) , Welcome_Email_Sent__c =false, contains(CC_Product__r.WFCategory__c , "CAMS6_FRA_VC")
)

rules.fullName: French CAMS6 Virtual Classroom %28Standalone and Cert Package%29 Unpaid Orders
rules.formula: AND($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration', CONTAINS(CC_Product__r.ccrz__SKU__c, "CAMSVS6-FR"), not(or( ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Authorized"), ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Completed") )), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Inactive"), CC_Order__r.Total_Revenue__c >0 )

AND ($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , Assignee__c <> "" , not(isblank(CC_Product__r.Event_Date__c)), not(ISPICKVAL(Invitation_Status__c, "Canceled")), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Active"), Attended__c , ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Certificate_Language__c , "Bilingual") )

AND ($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , Assignee__c <> "" , not(isblank(CC_Product__r.Event_Date__c)), not(ISPICKVAL(Invitation_Status__c, "Canceled")), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Active"), Attended__c , ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Certificate_Language__c , "English") )

AND ($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , Assignee__c <> '', CONTAINS(CC_Product__r.WFCategory__c, "Con-Badge_Bil"), Time_based_emails_sent__c = false, isblank(Contact_Country_Eloqua__c), not(ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Language__c ,"English")), not(ISPICKVAL(Invitation_Status__c, "Canceled")), not(CC_Product__r.Send_Reg_Confirm_Email__c) )

AND ($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , Assignee__c <> '', CONTAINS(CC_Product__r.WFCategory__c, "Con-Badge_ENU"), Time_based_emails_sent__c = false, isblank(Contact_Country_Eloqua__c), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Language__c ,"English"), not(ISPICKVAL(Invitation_Status__c, "Canceled")), not(CC_Product__r.Send_Reg_Confirm_Email__c) )

AND ($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , Assignee__c <> "" , or(ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_1__c,"Conferences"), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_2__c, "Exam Prep"), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_2__c, "Custom Training"), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_2__c, "Seminars") ), not(ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Language__c ,"English")), not(ISPICKVAL(Invitation_Status__c, "Canceled")), ISBLANK( CancelDate__c) , CC_Product__r.Send_BYG_Email__c )

AND ($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , Assignee__c <> "" , or(ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_1__c,"Conferences"), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_2__c, "Exam Prep"), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_2__c, "Seminars") ), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Language__c ,"English"), not(ISPICKVAL(Invitation_Status__c, "Canceled")), ISBLANK( CancelDate__c), CC_Product__r.Send_BYG_Email__c )

AND ($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , Assignee__c <> "" , ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_1__c,"Chapter"), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_2__c, "Event"), not(ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Language__c ,"English")), not(ISPICKVAL(Invitation_Status__c, "Canceled")), ISBLANK( CancelDate__c), CC_Product__r.Send_BYG_Email__c )

AND ($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , Assignee__c <> "" , ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_1__c,"Chapter"), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_2__c, "Event"), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Language__c ,"English"), not(ISPICKVAL(Invitation_Status__c, "Canceled")), ISBLANK( CancelDate__c), CC_Product__r.Send_BYG_Email__c )

AND ($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , Assignee__c <> "" , or( ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_1__c,"Conferences"), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_2__c, "Event"), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_2__c, "Exam Prep"), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_2__c, "Custom Training"), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_2__c, "Seminars") ), not(ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Language__c ,"English")), not(ISPICKVAL(Invitation_Status__c, "Canceled")), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Inactive"), not(or( ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Authorized"), ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Completed") )), No_payment_reminder__c = False, CC_Product__r.Send_Payment_Reminder__c, ISPICKVAL(CC_Order__r.Type__c, "B2C") )

AND ($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , Assignee__c <> "" , or( ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_1__c,"Conferences"), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_2__c, "Event"), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_2__c, "Exam Prep"), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_2__c, "Custom Training"), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_2__c, "Seminars") ), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Language__c ,"English"), not(ISPICKVAL(Invitation_Status__c, "Canceled")), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Inactive"), not(or (ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Authorized"), ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Completed") ) ), No_payment_reminder__c = False, CC_Product__r.Send_Payment_Reminder__c, ISPICKVAL(CC_Order__r.Type__c, "B2C") )

AND ($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , Assignee__c <> "" , or( ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_1__c,"Conferences"), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_2__c, "Event"), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_2__c, "Exam Prep"), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_2__c, "Custom Training"), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_2__c, "Seminars") ), not(ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Language__c ,"English")), not(ISPICKVAL(Invitation_Status__c, "Canceled")), CC_Product__r.Send_Reg_Confirm_Email__c )

AND ($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , Assignee__c <> "" , or( ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_1__c,"Conferences"), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_2__c, "Event"), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_2__c, "Exam Prep"), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_2__c, "Custom Training"), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_2__c, "Seminars") ), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Language__c ,"English"), not(ISPICKVAL(Invitation_Status__c, "Canceled")), CC_Product__r.Send_Reg_Confirm_Email__c )

AND ($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , Assignee__c <> '', CONTAINS(CC_Product__r.WFCategory__c, "O-Con"), Time_based_emails_sent__c = false, isblank(Contact_Country_Eloqua__c),
ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Language__c ,"English"), not(ISPICKVAL(Invitation_Status__c, "Canceled")), not(CC_Product__r.Send_Reg_Confirm_Email__c) )

rules.fullName: India AML Regime Examination Welcome Letter
rules.formula: AND($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , Assignee__c <>"", or( ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Authorized"), ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Completed") ), Welcome_Email_Sent__c =false, ExamResult__c = "", CONTAINS(CC_Product__r.WFCategory__c, "CERT_IN-AML-Regime"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Active") )

rules.fullName: Internal Notification for Active Asset and Approved Certification Application
rules.description: FSA-2568. This communication advises certifications@ that the customer has paid for the Certification Fee and the application has been also approved.
rules.formula: AND( $Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Active"), ISCHANGED( Payment_Status__c ), ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Completed"), and(ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_1__c,"Certification"), or(ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_3__c,"New"), ISPICKVAL(CC_Product__r.Level_3__c,"Recertification"))), ExamResult__c = "", Assignee__c <>"", ISBLANK (CurrentExpirationDate__c), OR(Application_Received__c = true, Certification_Approved_Application__c=true, SG_AML_REGIME_Exam_Application_Approved__c=true ) )

AND ($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , contains(Enterprise_Product_HL__c,"ENTLATAM-P"), or( ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Authorized"), ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Completed") ), Welcome_Email_Sent__c =false, ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Active"))

AND ($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , Assignee__c <> "" , CONTAINS(CC_Product__r.WFCategory__c, "P3_CHS"), Customizable_Email_Push__c )
AND ($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , Assignee__c <> "" , CONTAINS(CC_Product__r.WFCategory__c, "P3_CHT"), Customizable_Email_Push__c )

rules.fullName: Paid Retakes Reschedule and Extensions Internal Notification
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Completed") && $Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' && TEXT( CC_Product__r.Level_3__c)='Retake/Extension'

AND($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Active"), or( ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Authorized"), ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Completed") ), Welcome_Email_Sent__c =false, ExamResult__c = "", CONTAINS(CC_Product__r.WFCategory__c, "Prem_WEB_ENG"), Assignee__c <>"")

AND ($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , Assignee__c <> "" , CONTAINS(CC_Product__r.WFCategory__c , "RECERT"), ISPICKVAL( Status__c ,"Active"), or( ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Authorized"), ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Completed") ), Welcome_Email_Sent__c =false, Certification_Approved_Application__c = TRUE, ISPICKVAL(Account.Language_Preference__c ,"ko") )

AND ($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , Assignee__c <> "" , Name = "Recertifications" , ISPICKVAL( Status__c ,"Active"), Paid_Cert__c, Certification_Approved_Application__c = TRUE, NOT(CONTAINS(CC_Product__r.ccrz__SKU__c,"ADVREC")), ISPICKVAL(Account.Language_Preference__c ,"Bahasa Indonesia") )

AND ($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , Assignee__c <> "" , CONTAINS(CC_Product__r.WFCategory__c , "RECERT"), ISPICKVAL( Status__c ,"Active"), or( ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Authorized"), ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Completed") ), Welcome_Email_Sent__c =false, Certification_Approved_Application__c = TRUE, NOT(ISPICKVAL(Account.Language_Preference__c ,"es")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Account.Language_Preference__c ,"zh_TW")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Account.Language_Preference__c ,"zh_CN")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Account.Language_Preference__c ,"ja")) )

AND ($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , Assignee__c <> "" , CONTAINS(CC_Product__r.WFCategory__c , "RECERT"), ISPICKVAL( Status__c ,"Active"), or( ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Authorized"), ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Completed") ), Welcome_Email_Sent__c =false, Certification_Approved_Application__c = TRUE, ISPICKVAL(Account.Language_Preference__c ,"ja") )

AND ($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , Assignee__c <> "" , CONTAINS(CC_Product__r.WFCategory__c , "RECERT"), ISPICKVAL( Status__c ,"Active"), or( ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Authorized"), ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Completed") ), Welcome_Email_Sent__c =false, Certification_Approved_Application__c = TRUE, ISPICKVAL(Account.Language_Preference__c ,"zh_CN") )

AND ($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , Assignee__c <> "" , CONTAINS(CC_Product__r.WFCategory__c , "RECERT"), ISPICKVAL( Status__c ,"Active"), or( ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Authorized"), ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Completed") ), Welcome_Email_Sent__c =false, Certification_Approved_Application__c = TRUE, ISPICKVAL(Account.Language_Preference__c ,"es") )

AND ($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , Assignee__c <> "" , CONTAINS(CC_Product__r.WFCategory__c , "RECERT"), ISPICKVAL( Status__c ,"Active"), Paid_Cert__c, Certification_Approved_Application__c = TRUE, ISPICKVAL(Account.Language_Preference__c ,"zh_TW") )

rules.fullName: Spanish Unpaid Orders Virtual Classroom %28Standalone and Cert Package%29
rules.formula: AND ($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration' , Assignee__c <> "" , not(or( ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Authorized"), ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Completed") )), BEGINS(CC_Product__r.ccrz__SKU__c , "CAMSVS6S"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Inactive") )

rules.fullName: Unpaid Orders Virtual Classroom %28Standalone and Cert Package%29
rules.formula: and ($Profile.Name <> 'Data Migration', Assignee__c <> "" , or(contains(CC_Product__r.WFCategory__c , "CAMS6_VC_1"), contains(CC_Product__r.WFCategory__c , "CAMS6_VC_2") ), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Inactive"), not(or( ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Authorized"), ISPICKVAL(Payment_Status__c , "Completed") )) )

rules.fullName: Update Current Expiration Date After Exam Result is Pass
rules.description: This was deactivated on 11/19/2020 due to FSA-347

rules.fullName: Update Current Expiration Date After Paid off
